name: Salsa Chicken Burrito Filling
author: JUBEEFISH
summary: Quick, easy burrito/taco filling that is delicious and freezes great! I serve this with tortillas, shredded Cheddar cheese and little sour cream. You could fill the tortillas and put them all in a baking dish and then cover with salsa and cheese and bake for about 10 minutes, if you don't want a mess at the table.
directions: Place chicken breasts and tomato sauce in a medium saucepan over medium high heat
Bring to a boil, then add the salsa, seasoning, cumin, garlic and chili powder
With a fork, start pulling the chicken meat apart into thin strings
Keep cooking pulled chicken meat and sauce, covered, for another 5 to 10 minutes
Add hot sauce to taste and stir together (Note: You may need to add a bit of water if the mixture is cooked too high and gets too thick
